trans-unit.source: Provides information about input from a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref> to a <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornece informações sobre a entrada de um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref> para um <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Use the RawStylusInput to get information about the input the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> receives when the user moves the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Use o RawStylusInput para obter informações sobre a entrada de <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>recebe quando o usuário move a caneta.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>

trans-unit.source: Gets the stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os pontos de caneta que são coletados de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The stylus points that are collected from the stylus.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de caneta que são coletados de caneta.

trans-unit.source: Subscribes to the application thread's corresponding stylus methods.
trans-unit.target: Assina os métodos de caneta correspondentes do segmento do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The pen's input is routed to an element's <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn> on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: A caneta da entrada é roteada para um elemento <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>no thread de caneta.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn>

trans-unit.source: Because accurate hit-testing cannot be performed on the pen thread, some elements might occasionally receive stylus input intended for other elements.
trans-unit.target: Como testes de colisão precisos não podem ser executada no thread de caneta, alguns elementos podem ocasionalmente receber entrada de caneta destinada para outros elementos.

trans-unit.source: If you need to be sure the input was routed correctly before performing an operation, call the NotifyWhenProcessed method in the method that occurs on the pen thread.
trans-unit.target: Se você precisa ter certeza de que a entrada foi roteada corretamente antes de executar uma operação, chame o método NotifyWhenProcessed no método que ocorre no thread de caneta.

trans-unit.source: The following table lists where to call NotifyWhenProcessed to subscribe to the application thread's method.
trans-unit.target: A tabela a seguir lista onde quer chamar NotifyWhenProcessed para inscrever-se ao método do segmento do aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: |Call NotifyWhenProcessed in this method|To subscribe to this method| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>|
trans-unit.target: | Chamar NotifyWhenProcessed nesse método | Para assinar este método | |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A>| | <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A>| | <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A>|</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUpProcessed%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusUp%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMoveProcessed%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusMove%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDownProcessed%2A></xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPlugIns.StylusPlugIn.OnStylusDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: The data to pass to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Os dados a serem passados para o thread de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Sets the stylus points that are passed to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Define os pontos de caneta que são passados para o thread de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Events such as <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown> and <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>, can get the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> set by SetStylusPoints by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Eventos como <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown>e <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove>, pode obter o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection>definido por SetStylusPoints chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusEventArgs.GetStylusPoints%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Input.StylusPointCollection> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusMove> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.StylusDown>

trans-unit.source: The stylus points to pass to the application thread.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de caneta para passar para o thread de aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current stylus device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador do dispositivo de caneta atual.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.StylusDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the identifier of the current tablet device.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o identificador do dispositivo de tablet atual.

trans-unit.source: The identifier of the current <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O identificador do atual <xref href="System.Windows.Input.TabletDevice"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the time at which the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a hora em que ocorreu a entrada.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Timestamp property is the value of the <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property at which the stylus event occurred.
trans-unit.target: O valor da propriedade de carimbo de hora é o valor da <xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade na qual ocorreu o evento de caneta.</xref:System.Environment.TickCount%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The time at which the input occurred.
trans-unit.target: A hora em que ocorreu a entrada.
